attributes.action: Recommend Joanna Lumley as a Dame
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Joanna Lumley has done a fantastic job campaigning for the Gurkha's and her efforts should be rewarded.

We the undersigned call on Government to recognise the efforts made by Joanna Lumley and recommend that she be recognised in the British honours system as a Dame Commander of the Order of the British Empire.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
